thread.title: Khloé Kardashian and Lamar Odom call off their divorce as NBA star continues recovery - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Khloé Kardashian and Lamar Odom call off their divorce as NBA star continues recovery - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Khloé Kardashian and Lamar Odom call off their divorce as NBA star continues recovery - Showbiz
text: Khloé Kardashian and Lamar Odom have apparently halted divorce proceedings in the wake of the NBA star's hospitalisation.Odom was discharged from a Las Vegas hospital earlier this week to seek more treatment in LA, having allegedly collapsed last week at a Nevada brothel. © WENN Kardashian formally filed for divorce from Odom last year, although their petition was never officially signed by a California judge.According to E! News, Kardashian's attorney was in court today (October 21) to officially request a withdrawal of the divorce petition.The presiding judge granted this request and officially ended the divorce proceedings, reports suggest. Digital Spy has reached out to Kardashian's spokesperson for comment on the matter. © WENN On Tuesday (October 20), Kardashian spoke out for the first time to thank her fans for sending prayers and well-wishes to Odom.She wrote: "Under their amazing care, incredible strides have been made. You can never be prepared for an experience like this, but without the outpouring of love and endless prayers that Lamar has received and the strength I was given from my loved ones, it would have been difficult to endure."Thank you for your continued support. God is great!!!"The reality star's family members Kim Kardashian West, Kourtney Kardashian, Rob Kardashian, Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner have all rallied support for Odom on social media as well over the last week.
